duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare food items for residents and their guests as requested, including special request, in a timely and consistent manner.
Remain flexible and agile with dietary needs and requests
Inspect food products and supplies as needed
Determine food and supply needs based on menu and dietary needs
Comply with outlined safety regulations, procedures, and 5-Star policies.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
